member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Silverlight.ReportViewer.EnsureAbsoluteUri(System.Uri)
member.summary: Determines whether the given is absolute. If not, creates a new absolute based on the combination of for the current application and the given relative uri.

remarks.para: If the uri is absolute, the same instance is returned.
If the uri is relative, a new absolute based on the combination of of the current application and the given relative uri is created. The usually points to the application package (XAP).
